Name: A Slime And A Civil War
About the game: A Slime And A Civil War is a 2D side-scrolling action game with bullet hell elements where you will slash and slide your way through a world where every living being is a slime and take down the slime dictator. Pay attention, the world might have a little bit more to it than it first seems. What the game has to offer Fast paced action gameplay. Bullet hell-esq bosses. A not so serious story about the slime society. Levels with different distinct visuals. Unique soundtrack for every level and boss. Mysteries to be solved. Something that does not belong.
